Packages that use dev.gamekit.animation
Package
Description
dev.gamekit.animation
 
dev.gamekit.core
 
  • Classes in dev.gamekit.animation used by dev.gamekit.animation
    Class
    Description
    Animation
    Animation holds a value which increments from 0 to 1 over some duration.
    Animation.RepeatMode
    Indicates how an animation behaves when it reaches its end
    Animation.State
    Constants for the state of an Animation
    Animation.StateListener
    Callback interface for Animation state changes
    Animation.ValueListener
    Callback interface for Animation value changes
    AnimationCurve
    AnimationCurve transforms an Animation value from a (0 - 1) range to a point on a curve equation defined in AnimationCurve.get(double) method.
